title: Korean Build ... ???

replies.body: And what exactly is wrong with the items?

I don't see anything inherently wrong with these two items. From what I can tell, it only benefits a handful of champions (only Lucian comes to mind right now), and rushing/building Black Cleaver on certain ADC's probably isn't the best idea considering you'd likely either be giving up attack speed or the Last Whisper.

MF can build it as well, and honestly it can be built on most ADC's if you have a major amount of tanks on the enemy team, as long as someone else can take out the enemy squishy's (AKA your mid laner)
